items.title: Apple In Advanced Talks With JPMorgan To Replace Goldman Sachs For Credit Card Program: Report
items.description: According to a report by The Wall Street Journal, the deal hasn’t been finalized yet, and the negotiations could still come undone given the “number o...

items.title: US Consumer Confidence Rises In July Amid Easing Economic Concerns
items.description: According to data released by the Conference Board on Tuesday, consumer confidence rose to 97.2 points in July, up from 95.2 in June.

items.title: Novo Nordisk Stock Slumps After Slashing Full-Year Guidance, But Retail Has Its Eyes On An Oral Weight Loss Drug
items.description: The company now expects full-year sales growth of 8% to 14% at a constant exchange rate, down from its previous estimate of 13% to 21%.

items.title: Apple Could Get A $65 Billion Boost From Foldable iPhone Launch In 2026, Says JPMorgan
items.description: JPMorgan estimates the foldable iPhone will be priced at $1,999, potentially opening a $65 billion market opportunity for Apple.

items.title: US Job Openings Fall In June After 2 Months Of Rise
items.description: Open positions at the end of June stood at 7.44 million, down from 7.71 million in May as revised by the Bureau of Labor Statistics.
